text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump The World Health Organization (WHO) declared Coronavirus public health emergency of int'l concern on Jan 30th. 
In the US, gov officials urged residents not to travel to China, issuing a level 4 travel advisory. Jan 31st,  AIRLINES cancel flights thru March, not Trump!
